transcription.text: Hello po, good afternoon. Ma'am Jane Aglipot.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay po ma'am. By the way po ma'am, si Homer po ito ma'am ng AMG Collection. I'm calling ma'am on behalf of Maya Bank. May mind ko lang di kayo ma'am na this call is recorded. So ma'am, for account security purposes na po yas ko yung last 4 digits po ma'am. Yung naka-register po sa Maya account nyo is 5390. Tama po. So, upon checking po kasi ma'am ng system namin ma'am, may outstanding balance po kayo ma'am sa Maya Credit nyo ma'am, na 1080.52 centavos, then one day past yun na po siya. Need po kasi ma'am ng immediate settlement ma'am to date, since pinapapriority na po siya ma'am ni Maya Bank.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kailan po yung sahod nyo ma'am? Actually ma'am, hindi po siya ma'am applicable sa account yung ma'am na mag-settle po kayo ng katapusan ma'am. Kasi ma'am, pinapapriority po siya ma'am ni Maya Bank, para hindi po kayo ma'am magkaroon ma'am ng any bad record po ma'am, sa Maya Credit po ninyo. Yan po kasi ma'am. Pwede naman po kayo ma'am. Pwede naman po kayo ma'am, mga hera ma'am, sa friends po ninyo or relatives,
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: kasi po itong account nyo ma'am, possible for real or naman siya. Once po ma'am na na-full payment nyo po siya.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Hello po, good afternoon. Ma'am Jane Aglipot.

Okay po ma'am. By the way po ma'am, si Homer po ito ma'am ng AMG Collection. I'm calling ma'am on behalf of Maya Bank. May mind ko lang di kayo ma'am na this call is recorded. So ma'am, for account security purposes na po yas ko yung last 4 digits po ma'am. Yung naka-register po sa Maya account nyo is 5390. Tama po. So, upon checking po kasi ma'am ng system namin ma'am, may outstanding balance po kayo ma'am sa Maya Credit nyo ma'am, na 1080.52 centavos, then one day past yun na po siya. Need po kasi ma'am ng immediate settlement ma'am to date, since pinapapriority na po siya ma'am ni Maya Bank.
translation.english: Okay ma'am. By the way ma'am, this is Homer from AMG Collection. I'm calling ma'am on behalf of Maya Bank. I just want to let you know that this call has been recorded.

translation.tagalog: Kailan po yung sahod nyo ma'am? Actually ma'am, hindi po siya ma'am applicable sa account yung ma'am na mag-settle po kayo ng katapusan ma'am. Kasi ma'am, pinapapriority po siya ma'am ni Maya Bank, para hindi po kayo ma'am magkaroon ma'am ng any bad record po ma'am, sa Maya Credit po ninyo. Yan po kasi ma'am. Pwede naman po kayo ma'am. Pwede naman po kayo ma'am, mga hera ma'am, sa friends po ninyo or relatives,
translation.english: When is your salary ma'am? Actually ma'am, he is not applicable to the account that ma'am you have to settle at the end ma'am. Because ma'am, he is prioritized by Maya Bank, so that you don't have any bad record ma'am, on your credit.

translation.tagalog: kasi po itong account nyo ma'am, possible for real or naman siya. Once po ma'am na na-full payment nyo po siya.
translation.english: Because this account, ma'am, is possible for real or he is.
